thread.section_title: Hoselink Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Hoselink | hoselink.com.au | 2 of 4
thread.title: Rick

author: Rick
title: Rick
text:
Website ordering couldn't be easier. The package was sent very quickly with nothing missing from an order which included a few extras. The extras (cover, hose joining kit) were reasonably priced too.
The product was quickly installed....but make sure you have a 12 mm drill bit in your kit! The whole lot went in within 15minutes and looks great. It functions as advertised. No leaks and very easy to handle.
If I need any other equipment in this line, I wouldn't hesitate to order from hoselink again.
Rick, Launceston Tasmania
